name: qualifiedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a qualified (= limited) way: Logic is sometimes regarded as a mental science, but it is only one qualifiedly. Whether a communication is qualifiedly privileged is question for the court to decide.
More examplesFewer examplesHe qualifiedly supports the government's policy on immigration.I would argue that most doctors would be qualifiedly supportive of a refusal of treatment in this case.A refund of the fees was qualifiedly provided for until the statute was amended in 1975.
